summary: Feature request to ensure built-in query responses use RawValue when feature #1629 is completed. This is part of implementing consistent query response handling across the TypeScript SDK.
userImpact: Ensures built-in query responses are properly formatted and consistent with the RawValue pattern.
proposedFix: Make built-in queries return raw values once #1629 is completed
resolutionDetails: Implemented as part of completing feature #1629 for RawValue support in query responses
keyQuote: When #1629 is done, make sure built-in queries return a raw value
